name: Kakao Talk Link
author: Jongmyoung Kim

sections.description:
Puts Kakao Talk Link Button of below your posts.
You can Insert Yellow button in contents bellow on your blog.
Screenshot : See Plugin Folder’s “screenshot.png”
More info : http://icansoft.com/?page_id=113

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘kakaolink’ directory into the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select position option in Dashboard > Setting > Kakao Talk Link
  4. Button to tune in the style sheet to form “kakaotalk_link” Add classes.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • first plugin

1.1

  • Add Setting – Left or Right Position

1.2

  • Bug Fix – ‘Kakao Talk Link’ menu did not display in dashbord setting menu on single site.

1.3

  • Bug Fix – Akismet plugin is installed, click the button on the page can not be.

1.4

  • Bug Fix – Script Error.

1.5

  • Print Blog Title

1.6

  • When the title may contain quotes errors when attempting resolve kakaotalk Share.
